title: Budapest Airport innovates once again with the launch of a new mobile appTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Budapest Airport innovates once again with the launch of a new mobile app
Available in both IOS and Android versions, users should search for “ BUD Airport” in the app store and Google play. Once downloaded users will be able to get the latest status regarding flight information, parking options, shopping or other airport services along with useful maps and news updates. All of the available features reflect the most sought after information passengers visit the www.bud.hu website for.
Chief Commercial officer – Kam Jandu commented “Having set up a dedicated Digital services team in 2014 we are delighted to bring this mobile app to market which will provide the latest relevant information for passengers. Budapest Airport fully understands the need for real time information and once downloaded we are confident that users will be more than satisfied”
Budapest Airport continues to make sizeable progress in the digital arena and have already been acknowledged for having one of the highest Facebook page likes relative to the overall passenger number amongst all airports in Europe. BUD’s digital presence can also be found on twitter, Instagram and Linkedin to ensure all audiences are catered for.
Jandu continued “Whether you are looking for flight information, parking offers or which shops have special deals, this app gives you all you need on your smart phones so passengers will have plenty of information to hand literally. Along with Budapest Airport’s free Wi-Fi service, this free mobile app has taken another step in keeping customers connected”
Source:- BUD
